name: mbg-seeders
description: Seeding scripts for MBG (Makanan Bergizi Gratis) database

scripts.seed:nice-to-have:critical: npm run seed:system-config && npm run seed:historical-deliveries && npm run seed:historical-payments
scripts.seed:nice-to-have:high: npm run seed:user-activity-logs && npm run seed:regional-statistics && npm run seed:catering-contracts
scripts.seed:nice-to-have:medium: npm run seed:notification-history && npm run seed:performance-metrics && npm run seed:weekly-menu-plans
scripts.seed:nice-to-have:low: npm run seed:photo-evidence && npm run seed:public-feedback && npm run seed:budget-allocations && npm run seed:audit-trails && npm run seed:school-student-counts && npm run seed:catering-menu-catalog && npm run seed:delivery-routes
scripts.seed:nice-to-have:all: npm run seed:nice-to-have:critical && npm run seed:nice-to-have:high && npm run seed:nice-to-have:medium && npm run seed:nice-to-have:low
scripts.seed:all: npm run seed:users && npm run seed:menu-items && npm run seed:deliveries && npm run seed:allocations && npm run seed:verifications && npm run seed:payments && npm run seed:issues && npm run seed:escrow-transactions && npm run seed:payment-events && npm run seed:delivery-confirmations && npm run seed:public-payment-feed && npm run seed:refunds && npm run seed:payment-methods && npm run seed:blockchain-sync-log && npm run seed:poverty-data-cache && npm run seed:stunting-data-cache && npm run seed:ai-food-analyses && npm run seed:anomaly-alerts && npm run seed:vendor-risk-assessments && npm run seed:blockchain-transaction-history && npm run seed:smart-contract-events-raw && npm run seed:wallet-balances-snapshot
scripts.seed:ai-features: npm run seed:poverty-data-cache && npm run seed:stunting-data-cache && npm run seed:ai-food-analyses && npm run seed:anomaly-alerts && npm run seed:vendor-risk-assessments
scripts.seed:blockchain-analytics: npm run seed:blockchain-transaction-history && npm run seed:smart-contract-events-raw && npm run seed:wallet-balances-snapshot
